articles.title: Notable deaths 2023 - BBC
articles.description: A World Cup-winning England footballer; the US star of one of the most successful sitcoms ever made; a multi-million-selling singer whose career spanned five decades; and the designer who brought the miniskirt to the High Street - here are some of the well-kn…

articles.author: Jack Kim, Jimin Jung
articles.title: South Korea police defend probe of 'Parasite' actor who was found dead - Reuters
articles.description: The head of the district police force that investigated South Korean actor Lee Sun-kyun over allegations of illegal drug use on Thursday defended the tough questioning of him before he was found dead.
articles.content: SEOUL, Dec 28 (Reuters) - The head of the district police force that investigated South Korean actor Lee Sun-kyun over allegations of illegal drug use on Thursday defended the tough questioning of hi… [+2801 chars]
